Greetings: Hello! Welcome to our support service. How may I assist you today?
user_name: To better assist you, could you please provide your name?
user_email: To better assist you, could you please provide your email?
user_number: To better assist you, could you please provide your phone number?
file_not_found: I apologize, it seems there's an issue with the file. A ticket has been raised to our support team. They'll reach out to you shortly.
file: I'm sorry, it seems there's an issue with the file. A ticket has been raised to our support team. They'll reach out to you shortly.
EDA_code: I'm sorry, it seems there's an issue with the EDA code. A ticket has been raised to our support team. They'll reach out to you shortly.

about_bot: I'm here to assist you 24/7. How can I help you today?
affirm: Great! Is there anything else you need assistance with?
bye: Thank you for reaching out! If you have any more questions in the future, don't hesitate to ask. Have a wonderful day!
